name: Biohazard 2
description:
A once-peaceful city is under attack by zombies, and the military is stretched thin trying to defeat the horde. To help support them, the military has turned to your elite team of mercenaries and is promising a big payday for a successful mission. Only stipulation is: your bonus will depend on how many zombies you kill. 

Sequel to the single-player shooter "Biohazard" seen at Florida Poly's Fall 2021 Game Expo, "Biohazard 2" expands on the original by allowing up to 4 players to join together against the zombie horde. The more zombies you kill, the more points you get, so prove you are a zombie-killing pro by making it to the top of the scoreboard against your friends.

"Biohazard 2" will be released and playable at the Florida Poly Spring 2022 Game Expo, so come and try it out on April 23rd!
